mapper.select: SELECT ub.blog_id, ub.user_id, ub.blog_content, ub.view_count, ub.like_count, ubi.image_url FROM tb_user_blog ub, tb_user_blog_image ubi WHERE ub.blog_id = ubi.blog_id ORDER BY ub.create_time DESC

SELECT ub.view_count, ub.like_count, ub.blog_content, ubi.image_url FROM tb_user_blog ub, tb_user_blog_image ubi WHERE ub.blog_id IN (SELECT u.blog_id FROM tb_user_blog u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}) AND ubi.blog_id = ub.blog_id AND ubi.image_url IN (SELECT tubi.image_url FROM tb_user_blog_image tubi WHERE tubi.blog_id = ub.blog_id)
SELECT ub.blog_content, ub.view_count, ub.like_count, ubi.image_url FROM tb_user_blog ub, tb_user_blog_image ubi WHERE ub.blog_id = #{blogId} AND ub.blog_id = ubi.blog_id
SELECT ub.blog_content, ub.view_count, ub.like_count, ubi.image_url FROM tb_user_blog ub, tb_user_blog_image ubi WHERE ub.blog_content like '%${blogContent}%' AND ub.blog_id = ubi.blog_id
